help.short: May be used to expand the planInformation.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="transactions">
<prop type="array" name="reservations">
<prop type="array" name="appliedScopes" cls="AppliedScopes_read">
<prop type="array" name="mergeSources">
<prop type="array" name="splitDestinations">
<prop type="array" name="aggregates">

help.short: The Azure Region where the reserved resource lives.
Turning this on will apply the reservation discount to other VMs in the same VM size group. Only specify for VirtualMachines reserved resource type.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="transactions">
<prop type="array" name="reservations">
<prop type="array" name="appliedScopes" cls="AppliedScopes_read">
<prop type="array" name="mergeSources">
<prop type="array" name="splitDestinations">
<prop type="array" name="aggregates">
